messages.subject: LFLF is looking for contributors
messages.msgSnippet: Live Free Learn Free is seeking submissions from unschoolers!  Who are we? Live Free Learn Free is a magazine for unschoolers and relaxed homeschoolers in
messages.messageBody:
Live Free Learn Free is seeking submissions from unschoolers! Who
are we?

Live Free Learn Free is a magazine for unschoolers and relaxed
homeschoolers in which to share ideas, stories, and experiences. All
material is written by those who home educate Â– both parents and
children. It is an inclusive magazine, not only for and by experienced
unschoolers, but also for and by those just starting down the path. It
embraces those who are radical in their unschooling methods and those
who are less so.

But mostly, it's a magazine about children living life - really
living
life - unhindered by curriculums, by lunch bells and standardized
tests, by schoolyard bullies and tedious homework. It's about
freedom. It's about families growing closer than they ever dreamed
possible.

We're looking for contributions on later readers, real work for kids,
and camp experiences, as well as on various other unschooling
subjects. You can view our submissions page for details of the themes
and submission guidelines (several guidelines have been changed
recently): http://www.livefreelearnfree.com/submit.htm

If you'd like to know more or you have any questions, feel free to
email me at folkypoet@....

Sincerely,
Shana Ronayne Hickman (editor)
www.livefreelearnfree.com
